destinations.name: Kruger National Park
destinations.description: One of Africa's largest game reserves, home to the Big Five (lion, leopard, rhino, elephant, buffalo) and over 500 bird species.

destinations.name: Table Mountain
destinations.description: Iconic flat-topped mountain offering panoramic views of Cape Town. Take the cable car or hike up for breathtaking scenery.

destinations.name: Robben Island
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 18 years. A powerful symbol of South Africa's struggle for freedom.

destinations.name: Victoria & Alfred Waterfront
destinations.description: Historic harbor with shopping, dining, entertainment, and stunning views of Table Mountain.

destinations.name: Blyde River Canyon
destinations.description: One of the largest canyons in the world, featuring the Three Rondavels, Bourke's Luck Potholes, and God's Window.

destinations.name: Cape of Good Hope
destinations.description: Most southwestern point of the African continent with dramatic cliffs, beaches, and diverse flora and fauna.

destinations.name: Addo Elephant National Park
destinations.description: Third largest national park in South Africa, home to over 600 elephants, lions, buffalo, and rhinos.

destinations.name: Drakensberg Mountains
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with stunning peaks, ancient San rock art, and excellent hiking trails.

destinations.name: Garden Route
destinations.description: Scenic coastal route featuring forests, mountains, beaches, and charming towns like Knysna and Plettenberg Bay.

destinations.name: Apartheid Museum
destinations.description: Powerful museum documenting South Africa's apartheid history and the struggle for democracy.

destinations.name: iSimangaliso Wetland Park
destinations.description: South Africa's first UNESCO World Heritage Site, featuring coral reefs, wetlands, and diverse wildlife.

destinations.name: Cradle of Humankind
destinations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with limestone caves containing fossils of ancient hominids.

destinations.name: Sun City Resort
destinations.description: Luxury resort complex featuring casinos, golf courses, water parks, and the Valley of Waves.

destinations.name: Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden
destinations.description: World-renowned botanical garden at the foot of Table Mountain, showcasing indigenous South African plants.

destinations.name: Soweto
destinations.description: Historical township that played a key role in the anti-apartheid struggle, with sites like Vilakazi Street.

destinations.name: Tsitsikamma National Park
destinations.description: Coastal national park with indigenous forests, dramatic coastline, and the famous Storms River Mouth.

destinations.name: Bo-Kaap
destinations.description: Colorful historical neighborhood known for its Cape Malay culture, cuisine, and brightly painted houses.

destinations.name: Golden Mile
destinations.description: Popular beachfront promenade with warm Indian Ocean waters, entertainment, and dining options.
